title: 40: What is Classical Education?
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Thomas takes us through what, exactly, classical education is. Sure, we've done the trivium, but beyond that, what is different about a classical school?
itunes:author: Bees, Burgs, Graemes.
itunes:subtitle: You know, we probably should have done this one earlier.
